name: SipsCo Gift Factory
description:
SipsCo has branched out into garbage recycling! Refine garbage into materials using the Refinery and use those materials to craft gifts at the Gift-o-matic. Feed resources into the Furnace to keep your machines powered!

Controls: 

WASD - Move

E - Pick up / Drop items, Interact

F - Throw held item

R - Rotate held item

Esc - Quit the game

Credits:

Programming: Chris Carmichael

Art: Mike Chan
